casebody.data:
Jeremy DROUILLARD, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
AMERICAN ALTERNATIVE INSURANCE CORPORATION, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 157518
COA: 334977 Supreme Court of Michigan. January 8, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellant to extend the time for filing his supplemental brief is GRANTED. The supplemental brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before January 11, 2019.
